snippet.title: 60 Seconds! Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam from 25.05.2015: http://store.steampowered.com/app/368...
Availability: http://robotgentleman.com/60seconds/#...

A dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival by Robot Gentleman.

An atomic bomb is about to drop and you only get 60 seconds to take cover! Bring your family and as many supplies, as you can, to the safety of a fallout shelter. Make them count! You will need to survive with whoever and whatever you brought, until the rescue comes. If it comes at all.

Find out more about the game at:
http://www.60secondsgame.com

Find out more about us at:
http://www.robotgentleman.com
http://www.twitter.com/robotgentleman
http://www.facebook.com/robotgentleman
https://discord.gg/8pwVJu6
